name: Final Lap R
overview:
Final Lap R is the final arcade game of the Final Lap racing game series. While it is similar to the previous games in gameplay, it uses brand new custom hardware and enhanced graphics.

Four new tracks are presented: the Hockenheimring, the Hungaroring, Spa-Francorchamps, and Interlagos. Once again, there were no ports from arcade to console or home computer, and this was the last Final Lap game for many years.
